Question.text: Which of the following tasks does the BADI implementing class perform?
You always want to check the user authorization for data entered in an input field of a selection
Question.answer1: In the event block AT SELECTION-SCREEN
Question.answer2: In the event block AT SELECTION-SCREEN OUTPUT
Question.answer4: In the event block AT SELECTION-SCREEN on VALUE-REQUEST

Question.text: What is the system field for the current date?
The following code indicates: SELECT fld1 fld2 FROM tab1 APPENDING TABLE itab WHERE fld1 IN sfld1.
Question.answer1: Add rows to the existing rows of itab
Question.answer2: Add rows to itab after first deleting any existing rows of itab
Question.answer3: Select rows from tab1 for matching itab entries
Question.answer4: Nothing, this is a syntax error

Question.text: TO include database-specific SQL statements within an ABAP program, code them between:
What can you use to achieve polymorphism?
What happens when an authorization check fails?
Question.answer2: The system field SY-SUBRC is set to a value other than zero
Question.answer3: A type E message is displayed
Question.answer4: A CX_AUTH_FAILED type exception is raised

Question.text: Which of the following predefined ABAP types is incomplete?
You created a transparent table and during activation got a warning message 'Enhancement category for table missing". What do you have to do to eliminate the warning message?
Question.answer1: Select any option other than Not Classified from the enhancement category
Question.answer2: Change the Data Class and Size category in the technical settings
Question.answer3: Provide the correct reference field for the Currency or Quantity field
Question.answer4: Select the option Not Classified from the enhancement category

Question.text: How is an ABAP program with several dialog steps executed?
Question.answer1: The program is always executed in just one dialog work process without roll out
Question.answer2: The ABAP dispatcher takes over the entire execution without assigning any work process
Question.answer3: The program is always executed in just one dialog work process with roll out
Question.answer4: Usually, dialog steps are assigned to different dialog work processes

Question.text: You want to display a dialog box in your ABAP program. Which statement do you use?
What is the SAP recommended naming convention for append structures of standard SAP tables?
Question.answer1: The name of the append structure must start with ZA
Question.answer2: The components of an append structure should start with ZZ or YY
Question.answer3: The components of an append structure should start with Z or Y
Question.answer4: The name of the append structure must start with ZZ or YY

Question.text: To which ABAP Dictionary definition can you assign fixed values?
Which of the following statements dynamically changes the data type of field z1?
What do global types and local types have in common?
Where can you set the GUI status and the GUI title for a classical screen (dynpro)?
Question.answer1: In a module called from PBO of the screen
Question.answer2: In the attributes of the screen
Question.answer3: In the properties of the related header UI element
Question.answer4: In a module called from PAI of the screen

Question.text: In regard to SET PF-STATUS, you can deactivate unwanted function codes by using
In which database table type is there a one-to-one relationship between the Dictionary table definition and the relevant physical table in the database?

A custom transparent table was created with delivery class A and a table maintenance view was generated for this table. You change the delivery class to C and the table is activated successfully. What additional steps do you have to complete?
Question.answer1: Maintain and transport the table using the Maintain Table Views transaction (SM30)
Question.answer3: Regenerate the existing maintenance view and adjust the table
Question.answer4: Delete the original maintenance view and then create and generate a new one

Question.text: You want to read data from two database tables A and B using a database join. Database table B contains details for data records stored in database table A. Your result should contain all combinations of matching rows from A and B plus all rows from A that do not have matching rows in B. Which statement do you use?
Question.answer2: SELECT '' FROM a INNER JOIN b ''
Question.answer3: SELECT '' FROM b RIGHT OUTER JOIN a ''
Question.answer4: SELECT '' FROM b RIGHT OUTER JOIN a ''

Question.text: In the technical settings for a transparent table, buffering is switched on and single record buffering is selected. Which statement uses the buffered data assuming that the WHERE clause contains restrictions for all key fields?
What is mandatory for automatic data transport between a variable and an input field on a classical screen (dynpro)?
Question.answer1: The variable must be declared using the DATA statement
Question.answer2: The property OUTPUT of the input field must be set
Question.answer3: The variable must be declared using the TABLES statement
Question.answer4: The name of the variable and the name of the input field must be identical

Question.text: You want to loop over an internal table without copying each table row to a work area. How can you achieve this using a field symbol?

You have defined a classical screen (dynpro) with mandatory input fields. You want to exit the screen using the Cancel button even if not all of the mandatory fields have been filled. What is necessary to achieve this?
Question.answer1: Set the function type assigned to the Cancel button to S and handle it in a module with the addition AT EXIT-COMMAND
Question.answer2: Assign function type E to the Cancel button and handle it in a module with the addition AT EXIT-COMMAND
Question.answer3: Set the function code assigned to the Cancel button to CANCEL and handle it in a module with the addition AT EXIT-COMMAND
Question.answer4: Use the LOOP AT SCREEN. ... ENDLOOP statement to set the "required" property of the input fields to zero

Question.text: How can you maintain documentation for input fields on your screen?
Question.answer1: Add documentation to the SCREEN table at PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT (PBO)
Question.answer2: Add documentation to the SCREEN table at PROCESS AFTER INPUT (PAI)
Question.answer3: Add documentation to the underlying data element
Question.answer4: Define text tables for the underlying structure

Question.text: What is the purpose of implicit enhancement points?
Question.answer1: To add fields to an SAP database table
Question.answer2: To add code to a standard SAP program
Question.answer3: To change code in a standard SAP program
Question.answer4: To create a secondary index for an SAP database table

Question.text: When do you need to use the GROUP BY clause in the SELECT statement?
Question.answer1: If you want to redefine the sequence of the columns in the result set
Question.answer2: If you want to use aggregate functions and all components in the field list are aggregate functions
Question.answer3: If you want to use ORDER BY to specify a sub-order
Question.answer4: If you want to use aggregate functions and at least one component in the field list is a column identifie

Question.text: You create a function group ZATP. What is the name of the corresponding main program?
A field declared as type T has the following internal representation:
In regard to field selection, what option of the SELECT statement is required?
You have written a program to output data using the ALV grid control. Which sequence of steps should be executed at runtime?
Question.answer1: 1. Create a container object 2. Create a grid object 3. Pass data to the grid object
Question.answer2: 1. Create a grid object 2. Pass data to the grid object 3. Create a container object
Question.answer3: 1. Pass data to the grid object 2. Create a container object 3. Create a grid object
Question.answer4: 1. Create a grid object 2. Create a container object 3. Pass data to the grid object

Question.text: You have 2 objects: O1 of type class C1 and O2 of type class C2. Class C2 is a subclass of class C1. Which of the following statements implements an up cast?
How do you program an input validation on a selection screen that allows users to correct their input?
Question.answer1: Implement the check at the event AT SELECTION-SCREEN OUTPUT. In case of an input error, a type E MESSAGE must be displayed
Question.answer2: Implement a check at the event AT SELECTION-SCREEN. In case of an input error, a type E MESSAGE must be displayed
Question.answer3: Implement the check at the event END-OF-SELECTION. In case of an input error, a type E MESSAGE must be displayed
Question.answer4: Implement the check at the event AT SELECTION-SCREEN. In case of an input error, a type A MESSAGE must be displayed

Question.text: To select all database entries for a certain WHERE clause into an internal table in one step, use
To which context object is the attribute LEAD_SELECTION_INDEX related?
Which property of the InputField UI element must be bound to a context attribute?

An executable ABAP program contains a standard selection screen and uses the event blocks AT SELECTION-SCREEN, AT SELECTION-SCREEN OUTPUT, INITIALIZATION, START-OFSELECTION. In which sequence will ABAP runtime call these event blocks?
Question.answer1: 1. AT SELECTION-SCREEN OUTPUT 2. INITIALIZATION 3. AT SELECTION-SCREEN 4. START-OF-SELECTION
Question.answer2: 1. INITIALIZATION 2. AT SELECTION-SCREEN 3. AT SELECTION-SCREEN OUTPUT 4. START-OF-SELECTION
Question.answer3: 1. INITIALIZATION 2. AT SELECTION-SCREEN OUTPUT 3. AT SELECTION-SCREEN 4. START-OF-SELECTION
Question.answer4: 1. INITIALIZATION 2. AT SELECTION-SCREEN OUTPUT 3. START-OF-SELECTION 4. AT SELECTION-SCREEN

Question.text: What can you change in the ABAP Debugger?
You want to use a BAdI to extend the functions of an SAP program. Which of the following tasks is necessary?
Question.answer2: Create an enhancement project using a customer exit
Question.answer3: Define an interface for the BAdI
Question.answer4: Implement a class that implements the BAdI interface

Question.text: Which hook method exists for all controller types?
After a successful SELECT statement, what does SY-SUBRC equal?
Which data type is allowed for the reference field of the Currency field?
How can you declare an internal table using the transparent table A as its line type?
Question.answer1: DATA gt_itab TYPE LINE OF a
Question.answer2: DATA gt_itab TYPE REF TO a
Question.answer3: DATA gt_itab TYPE TABLE OF a

Question.text: Which SELECT statement will always bypass the SAP table buffers?
How can you improve the performance when accessing a large data volume database table?
Question.answer1: Apply the appropriate data class and size category
Question.answer2: Switch the database table to fully buffered
Question.answer3: Define appropriate indexes for the database table
Question.answer4: Change the table type in the dictionary

Question.text: You want to define two database tables with different structures. Both tables should contain the fields CHANGE_DATE and CHANGE_TIME. How do you implement this in order to minimize the maintenance effort?
Question.answer1: Define a structure with these two fields and include this structure in both database tables
Question.answer2: Define an append structure with these two fields and assign this append structure to both database tables
Question.answer3: Define the two fields in each database table separately
Question.answer4: Define the two fields in one database table and copy them to the other database table

Question.text: Which statement is used to generically define the data reference variable z1?
Question.answer3: data z1 type ref to PA0001
Question.answer4: data z1 type ref to data

Question.text: dbtab is a transparent table. What is declared by the following statement? DATA myvar TYPE dbtab
Question.answer4: A reference to an internal table

Question.text: You want to create a transparent table in the ABAP dictionary. When is the table physically created in the database?
Question.answer3: When you run the database utility transaction (SE14)
Question.answer4: When you insert the table name and select Create

Question.text: You are writing a function module that will be called from external systems via remote function call (RFC). How do you report an error back to the external caller?
Question.answer1: Write the error data into a CHANGING parameter that is passed by value.
Question.answer2: Write the error data into an EXPORTING parameter that is passed by reference.
Question.answer3: Write the error data into a TABLES parameter that is passed by reference.
Question.answer4: Write the error data into a RECEIVING parameter that is passed by value.

Question.text: You defined data reference z1 generically. Which statement would you use to access the content of the referenced variable?
Question.answer4: Get reference of z1 into wa

Question.text: How do you embed a subscreen in a main screen?
Question.answer1: Use SET SUBSCREEN in a PBO module of the main screen
Question.answer2: Use SET SUBSCREEN in the flow logic of the main screen
Question.answer3: Use CALL SUBSCREEN in the flow logic of the main screen
Question.answer4: Use CALL SUBSCREEN in a PBO module of the main screen

Question.text: Which of the following characters is the first of a menu exit function code?
Which objects can share data through context mapping?
Question.answer1: View controller and another view controller

Question.text: Which of the following variables is the self-reference variable in ABAP OO?
How do you add fields to an SAP-delivered transparent table without modification?
Question.answer1: Use the database utility to enhance the definition on the database directly
Question.answer2: Add the new fields to the table definition
Question.answer3: Create an append structure containing the new fields
Question.answer4: Define a structure containing the new fields and include it in the table definition

Question.text: Within the source code of a function module, errors are handled via the keyword:
Which of the following describes the internal representation of a type D data object?
In regard to PERFORM, which of the following is NOT a true statement?
Question.answer1: May be used within a subroutine
Question.answer3: Recursive calls are allowed in ABAP
Question.answer4: Can call a subroutine in another program

Question.text: DOG is a subclass of ANIMAL. You have created a variable of type ANIMAL that references an instance of the DOG class. Which of the following statements can you use to copy this reference to a new variable of type DOG?
Which ABAP statement can make an element visible that you statically defined as invisible?
Which of the following values are replaceable in debugger mode?
When is a foreign key check performed on an input/output field?
Question.answer1: If the field refers to a dictionary field for which a search help is defined.
Question.answer2: If the field refers to a dictionary field for which an append search is defined.
Question.answer3: If the field refers to a dictionary field for which a check table is defined.
Question.answer4: If the field refers to a dictionary field for which a value help is defined.

Question.text: You want to translate dynamic text in a web Dynpro. From which abstract class should you inherit?
When does SAP recommend that you use a full buffering type for a database table?
Question.answer1: When the Table is very small and seldom written.
Question.answer2: When the table is very large and frequently written.
Question.answer3: When the table is very large and seldom written.
Question.answer4: When the table is very small and frequently written.

Question.text: Which task does the dispatcher perform?
Question.answer1: Executes programs that run without user interaction
Question.answer2: Verifies the correctness of ABAP programs
Question.answer3: Distributes requests to the work process
Question.answer4: Administrates the lock table in the shared memory

Question.text: What is the transaction code for the ABAP Editor?
The complete technical definition of a table field is determined by the field's:
The following code indicates: SELECT fld6 fld3 fld2 fld1 FROM tab1 INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE itab WHERE fld3 = pfld3
Question.answer1: The order of the fields in itab does not matter
Question.answer2: Fill the header line of itab, but not the body
Question.answer3: Table itab can only contain fields also in table tab1

Question.text: In an ABAP program, you want to assign an initial value to an elementary data object when you define it. Which addition must you use?
Which of the following can you do with the SAP Code Inspector?
You define a generic variable that can hold the ABAP types C, D, N, STRING and T. You want to restrict the use of other ABAP types. Which generic data type must you use in the definition?
Which action on the underlying dictionary object triggers a database table conversion?
Question.answer1: Inserting a field of type reference
Question.answer2: Reducing the size of a field
Question.answer4: Changing the order of non-key fields

Question.text: How would you define a method of an ABAP class to prevent this method from being available in a subclass?
You want to define a formal parameter to a subroutine that accepts only internal tables of type standard and type sorted as actual parameters. Which of the following generic ABAP types must you use?
You want to add a field of type CURR to a transparent table. What else you must do?
Question.answer1: Create a reference to a field of type CUKY
Question.answer2: Add a key field of type CUKY
Question.answer3: Create a new field CUKY as a predefined type
Question.answer4: Add a check table that contains a field of type CUKY

Question.text: You want to develop a validation for a selection screen field. If a wrong value is entered into the field an error message should be displayed and the focus should move to the field. Which event do you use to achieve this?
When are changes to the VB* tables transferred to the database?
Question.answer1: When the main program is executed.
Question.answer2: When the enqueue work process is executed.
Question.answer3: When the update work process is executed.
Question.answer4: When an update function module is executed.

Question.text: What can be exposed in the component interface of a Web dynpro component?
Question.answer1: Custom method of the component controller.
Question.answer4: Standard hook method of the component controller.

Question.text: The component interface of a Web Dynpro component contains three interface views. Which of the following controllers must also exist?
In which controller type can you embed a services call?
You want to include an element of type ‘Table’ in your Web Dynpro. Which action adds the corresponding columns to the table automatically?
Question.answer1: Generate a ‘BIND_TABLE’ method using the Web Dynpro method wizard.
Question.answer2: Bind the table attributes ‘DATA_SOURCE’ to the cotext node.
Question.answer4: Right click the table and select the ‘CREATE BINDING’ option.

Question.text: Which of the following transactions can you use to define transparent tables?
A structure has enhancement category 3: Can be enhanced (character -type). Which set of elementary types is allowed for the new fields?
Which statement ends a screen sequence and starts from the initial screen?
Which of the following structures is created when you use a table type to define one of its components?
Which of the following actions can be performed in the Process After Input (PAI) processing block?
Question.answer3: Set the GUI status of the screen.

Question.text: Which of the following ABAP statements throws an error at the syntax check?

You display the content of an internal table using an ALV grid control. The content of the internal table changes during the program. Which CL_GUI_ALV_GRID class method can you use to display the changed content?
When does SAP recommend that you use a hashed table?
Question.answer1: When a table must to be sorted automatically by key in ascending order
Question.answer2: When a table must be accessible by both index and key
Question.answer3: When a table is very large and you want to access the table by key only
Question.answer4: When a table is very large ans you want to access the table by index only

Question.text: Which of the following capabilities is provided by the Application Platform layer of SAP NetWeaver?
To which of the following must you assign newly created SAP repository objects?
You used Unified Modeling Language (UML) to design your classes. You want to describe the message exchange between objects. Which diagram type can you use?
Using the screen system table, what can you modify through a LOOP AT SCREEN… ENDLOOP construct?
Which type of transport task is used when you modify SAP standard objects?
You want to check the user input in the field FIELD_NAME on a classical screen. If an incorrect value is entered, the user should be able to correct the field value.
Question.answer2: FIELD field_name MODULE check_module MESSAGE Ennn
Question.answer3: CHAIN. MODULE check_module FIELD field_name. ENDCHAIN

Question.text: Which of the following enhancement options does not require any preparation from SAP?
In addition to the primary key of an internal table, how many secondary indexes can you define for an internal table?
Why should you bundle database updates in your dialog programs?
Question.answer1: To process the SAP LUW within the database LUW to ensure data consistency
Question.answer2: To be able to rollback database changes performed in the same dialog step
Question.answer3: To avoid database locks set by an SQL statement that persists until the end of the program
Question.answer4: To allow you to use SAP locks to ensure data consistency

Question.text: What process is used to establish the automatic transport of data between the view controller's context-attributes and the UI element in its layout?
